title: Practical Math Problem-Solving Process Utilizing Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level or higher mathematical knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Providing a virtual scenario-based learning environment for current professionals to solve workplace problems.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze practical problems and derive solutions using mathematical modeling in virtual scenarios
Learners can design optimal solutions by sharing problem-solving ideas in real-time with peer learners using collaborative tools
Learners can refine their mathematical approaches and apply them to practical tasks by incorporating formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
